titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> = "felef"? <*> = "subce"? billing shorthand of some kind s2: <*> = "Wintinp"? <*> = "sq"? faint writing at bottom of card, difficult to read

body.ab:
1938 CAMPBELL arlen 11 Square du Port Royal <*> Goblin 75-77. (24 rue St Benoit) dep <*> july 27 v 1939 50 Arlen Campbell dep 50 Feb 8 Life & Death of a Spanish Town 19 19 Golden Boy Feb 28 Feb 28 Inside Europe March 8 Feb 28 March 8 To Have and Have Not March 21 March Summing Up March 31 March 31 Writer in a Changing World April 8 Deducted 50 francs deposit for extra month. 50f
due 1 m <*> 50 dep. 50 balance 0 Jun Subscription 10 1m B 50 francs extra deposit 50 francs deposit ref. Sept. 16 extra dep. 35 -35- June 27 Journeys Between Wars July 11 July 29 Ends & Means Sept 1 will leave it with concierge Sept. 1 Unvanquished Sept 2 (sub to be renewed Sept 10) Sept 2 Man Against Himself Sept. 13 Sept. 13 With Maliee Toward Dome Sept 16 Subscriptions renewed Sept 10- Dec 10 B 100 Jan 15
CAMPBELL Sept 16 Ralph Fox Sept 28 Nov 7 Being Genius' Together Nov 14 Nov 14 In Hazard Nov 17 Nov 17 Best Short Stories of 1938 Nov 18 Nov 18 Pasquier Chronicles Nov 23 Nov 23 " " Nov 30 Nov 30 Apropos of Dolores Dec 5 Dec 5 Fifth Column Dec 14 Dec 14 Talks with Mussolini Jan 3 Jan 3 Long Valley Jan 11 Jan 11 Insanity Fair Jan 16 Jan 15th - February 15th Jan 16 Ascent of F-6 Jan 30 30 Of Mice + Men Feb 16 Feb 15- March 15 - 1m1vB 50 Feb 15 Assignment in Utopia Feb 20 20 New <*> 27 27 Theory + Practice of Socialism 14 Mar 14 Three Guineas 21 March 14 - April 15 1m1vB 50v will pay next time Mar 21 Christmas Holiday Mar 27 27 Man Against Himself returned when? Took out Family Reunion April 11 when? April 11 Journey to a War Apr 17 April 15 - May 15 April 17 Stars and Stripes Forever Apr 9 19 Joseph in Egypt Vol I May 3 bought lib cop. Man against Himself 166 <*> May 3 House of all Nations May 10 May 10 Beware of Pity May 15 left 50f dep wanted (1) Death of a Heart (2) Stein <*>
1939 CAMPBELL Arlen 24 rue St Benoit
Deposit 75 F Oct 6 Three Guineas 2F a day Oct 18 pd 15 F Oct 16 left deposit
